name: European Network of Medical Residents in Public Health
goal:
EuroNet MRPH aims to create a professional network among European residents in Public Health in order to share information on educational programs, to facilitate exchanges and common activities, as well as to develop a body of scientific research.

SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES:
To encourage initiatives by national associations of residents in Public Health taking part in the network;
To collaborate in shared projects of high scientific value, aimed at publication where applicable;
To promote the development of full professional skills for Public Health professionals;
To promote the education of residents in Public Health by organizing – or co-organizing meetings, conferences, workshops, etc.;
To facilitate internship for residents and trainees in Europe in the countries represented in the network;
To strengthen the role of Public Health professionals in Europe.
interests: Budget, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Health and public health workforce related EU initiatives. We do not follow EU initiatives on regular basis.
